ingredients.item: 3 medium, raw beetroots, peeled, halved and cut into 0.5cm slices
2 x 150g packs No.1 Baby Topped Rainbow Carrots, washed and dried
300g pack hand selected baby parsnips, trimmed, peeled and halved lengthways
3 Essential Red Onions, halved or quartered

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C, gas mark 6. Put the vegetables into a large roasting tin.
Drizzle with the oil, scatter with the leaves from 1 sprig of rosemary and season.
Cover with foil and roast for 20-25 minutes, then remove the foil and roast for a further 15 minutes, until tender and starting to colour at the edges.
Scatter over the remaining rosemary, season if needed and serve immediately.
